scripts.bundle:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.bundle:android-dev: react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle
scripts.bundle:ios-dev: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev true --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle
